name: They Come!
description:
Save the galaxy in 15 minutes or less!

They Come! is a turn-based sci-fi strategy game.

Your mission is to explore the sectors of your galaxy, defend the alien onslaught in each sector and discover parts of an ancient device you'll need to save our galaxy.

Of course 80 turns for each sector should be enough, right?!

Accept the mission, assemble the device to close all vortexes and annihilate those aliens!

The game features

  • 4 difficulty settings,
  • 3 game lengths,
  • a builtin tutorial,
  • ship upgrades to choose from,
  • highscores,
  • achievements
  • and procedurally generated scenarios for endless replayability!

NEW! Now with online cross platform highscores to compete with your friends!

Also online trophies in case you have a GameJolt account!

Currently the game is available for Windows and Android. Linux might become an option.

Purchase the game and support me to buy some Mac and IPad for additional releases on those platforms!

A demo version is also uploaded now. You can play two scenarios, no difficulty or game length settings, no shop, but you should be able to get the hang of it.

The newest release 1.0.26 adds several bugfixes and online highscores and achievements/trophies. Also winning the game in less scenarios gives more credits and thus a higher score.
